title: Establish a CID for Sweetie Pies

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.210	INTRODUCED BY: ALDERWOMAN MARLENE DAVIS    An ordinance approving the Petition of an owner of certain real property to establish a Community Improvement District, establishing the Sweetie Pie's Community Improvement District; finding a public purpose of the establishment of Sweetie Pie's Community Improvement District, and containing a severability clause.
